DOC.criteria: Females 18 55 year age inclusive , time consent . Healthy determine Investigator medically qualify designee base medical evaluation include medical history , review medication previously use , physical examination , laboratory test ECG . Female subject eligible participate pregnant ( confirm negative serum human chorionic gonadotropin [ hCG ] test ) , lactate , least one follow condition applies : Nonreproductive potential postmenopausal . Current chronic history liver disease , know hepatic biliary abnormality ( exception Gilbert 's syndrome asymptomatic gallstone ) . Corrected QT ( QTc ) > 450 millisecond ( msec ) .
